column5: Started with a flipp'n jig then buzzbait, chatterbait, spinnerbait, finally Frog & 7 LMbass later had to leave to go to a wedding in Elmira, thunder was roaring as we were packing up perfect timing, no pictures because of the steady rain, but everything was between 1.5 & 2 lbs, can't wait til tomorrow, Smallies here we come Richard

Well at least you got out for a bit and caught a few fish. The season has just started and there are many more days left! Isn't Elmira the Amish community? Good luck on the smallies. Looking forward to the report.
